level.heading: Enforcement.
level.text: The Mayor may establish a special law enforcement unit with police powers to enforce this chapter, Chapter 8 of this title, Chapter 13 of this title, subchapter II of Chapter 1 of this title, and the Water and Sanitation Codes, as compiled in 21 DCMR 700, et seq.

level.heading: Temporary Amendments of Section
level.text: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 8-901.

level.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
level.text: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 8-901.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-62, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 8-901.
For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-117, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 8-901.
